Today is a snow day! School for the next two days is cancelled too, so I'm pretty hyped.

I've been quite sluggish this weekend. I think the snow and cold weather has got me feeling quite down, and parkour class got cancelled. I'll use this time to prepare, energize, etc.. instead.

I won't go too deep into detail, but today, using commission money kindly donated to me by Rowan, I took a leap of faith to buy something that'll make me pretty damn happy for a long time. But I have to work on my commission now LOL.
